post.author: jonathanm
post.title: Where Sphinx Logic Stands
post.content: After going over the archives of the old blog. (man I can ramble). This is the current condtion of Sphinx Logic. There will be a SDK that you can apply for. And I'm giving the SDK out to the first 500 applicants. Also there will be a Framework which you can purchase. It will also be featured at the Windows Marketplace site. Also I would like to mention that Sphinx Logic is a Microsoft Partner. Have been since 2007. I will try to post things of importance and not just ramble. There are a couple of other products in the works as well. I will put all of the code snippets in the Code Sample section as well including the one's from the old blog.
